summary: Equipment Sync Bug Fix Verified - All 10 tests PASSED. Combo amplifiers (2x4 Combo, 2x6 Combo) now visible in both main simulation dropdown AND Admin Equipment management page.
passed_tests: GET /api/equipment returns all categories (radios, driver_amps, final_amps, antennas, vehicles) - PASS
GET /api/equipment driver_amps includes 2x4 key with correct specs (gain_db:20, transistors:6, current_draw:130) - PASS
GET /api/equipment driver_amps includes 2x6 key with correct specs (gain_db:21, transistors:8, current_draw:180) - PASS
All 7 driver amps present: none, 1-pill, 2-pill, 3-pill, 4-pill, 2x4, 2x6 - PASS
All 7 final amps present: none, 2-pill, 4-pill, 8-pill, 16-pill, 24-pill, 32-pill - PASS
All antennas present including predator-k2-12, predator-k2-17, predator-comp-*, fight-stix-6, fight-stix-12 (19 total) - PASS
All 13 vehicles present: jeep, shootout, silverado-rcsb, c10, suburban, wagon, etc. - PASS
Radio specs match frontend rfEngine.js: cobra-29 dead_key=0.75, peak_key=25, type=AM - PASS
Admin login with fallstommy@gmail.com / admin123 works, returns admin role - PASS
GET /api/admin/equipment returns all 52 equipment items - PASS
Admin equipment list includes 2x4 and 2x6 combo amps with correct specs - PASS
Frontend Dashboard: Driver Amplifier dropdown shows all 7 options including 2x4 Combo (2→4) (+20dB) and 2x6 Combo (2→6) (+21dB) - PASS
Frontend Admin EQUIPMENT tab shows 52 items with 2x4 and 2x6 Combo visible - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: Backend startup seed_data() now uses upsert pattern to sync all DEFAULT_EQUIPMENT items into MongoDB on every startup - correctly implemented
Equipment dictionaries in server.py (lines 130-196) match frontend rfEngine.js exactly
API /api/equipment endpoint correctly reads from MongoDB and returns equipment by category
Admin /api/admin/equipment endpoint correctly returns all 52 items from MongoDB

success_rate.frontend: 100% (combo amps visible in dropdown and admin page)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Equipment sync fix verified working. All 52 equipment items (6 radios, 7 driver amps, 7 final amps, 19 antennas, 13 vehicles) are now properly synced from backend defaults to MongoDB. The 2x4 and 2x6 combo amplifiers that were missing from admin page are now visible. The startup upsert logic ensures equipment stays in sync.

bug_fix_verification.issue: Combo amplifiers (2x4 Combo, 2x6 Combo) were visible in main simulation dropdown but missing from Admin equipment management page
bug_fix_verification.root_cause: Previous seed_data function only inserted equipment when collection was empty. If collection had partial data, new items weren't added.
bug_fix_verification.fix: Changed startup seed_data function to use upsert pattern - now syncs all default items on every startup
